Register Values:

R1 = 111	= 0007
R2 = 111	= 0007
R3 = 111	= 0007
R4 = 1000000000000000	= 8000
R5 = 1000000000000000	= 8000


Addr. Instruction

01  add r1 r2 r3
    0000 1001 1001 0000
    0990

02  sub r6 r1 r2
    0000 0101 0110 0010
    0562

03  and r2 r1 r3
    0000 0101 1010 0100
    05a4

04  or r2 r1 r3
    0000 0101 1010 0101
    05a5

05  sw r1 r3 5
    0100 1100 1000 0101
    4c85

06  lw r2 r3 5
    0010 1101 0000 0101
    2d05

07  beq r1 r2 2
    0110  0101 0000 0010
    6502

08	add r1 r4 r5
	0001 0010 1001 0000
	1290    

10  jump 8
    1000 0000 0000 1000
    8008



0000 0990 0562 05a4 05a5 4c85 2d05 6502
1290 0000 8008
